footer.desc: Searching for truth through action. Creating sustainable positive change through environmental protection, children's wellness, and community empowerment.

callToAction.title: Join Our Mission
callToAction.desc: Be part of the change you want to see. Whether through volunteering, partnerships, or spreading awareness - every action counts towards a cleaner, healthier future for our children and communities.

missionOverview.title: Our Mission
missionOverview.desc: Searching for truth through action. We're dedicated to building sustainable communities through environmental awareness, children's wellness, and collaborative partnerships.
missionOverview.plasticDesc: Promoting compostable alternatives and environmental awareness in communities
missionOverview.activeDesc: Physical wellness and health awareness programs for the next generation
missionOverview.greenDesc: Tree planting and sustainable community partnership initiatives

focusAreas.title: Our Focus Areas
focusAreas.desc: We work across multiple areas to create sustainable positive change in our communities, focusing on environmental protection and children's wellness.

plastic.title: Plastic Pollution Awareness
plastic.desc: Educational campaigns and compostable product promotion to reduce plastic waste in communities.

children.title: Children's Physical Health
children.desc: Fitness workshops, outdoor activities, and health awareness programs for young minds and bodies.

tree.title: Tree Plantation Drives
tree.desc: Community-driven environmental restoration through organized tree planting and forest conservation.

community.title: Community Partnerships
community.desc: Collaborative sustainable development through education, empowerment, and local engagement.

about.title: About SatyaKarma
about.subtitle: "Search for truth through action" - Our guiding principle since inception
about.historyPara1: SatyaKarma Welfare Foundation Society was born from a simple yet powerful belief: that meaningful change comes through dedicated action, not just words. Founded by a group of passionate environmental advocates and community leaders, our organization emerged in response to the growing environmental challenges facing our communities.
about.historyPara2: What started as local tree plantation drives has evolved into a comprehensive approach to environmental protection, combining plastic pollution awareness, children's health initiatives, and community empowerment programs. Our journey reflects the Sanskrit principle of "Satyakarma" - the pursuit of truth through righteous action.
about.missionDesc: We are committed to creating sustainable positive change through:
about.missionPoint1: Environmental protection and restoration through community-driven initiatives
about.missionPoint2: Reducing plastic pollution by promoting compostable alternatives
about.missionPoint3: Empowering children through health awareness and physical activity programs
about.missionPoint4: Building strong community partnerships for sustainable development
about.value1Desc: We believe in transparent, honest action that aligns with our environmental and social commitments.
about.value2Desc: Change happens when communities come together. We foster partnerships that amplify our collective impact.
about.value3Desc: We embrace creative solutions to environmental challenges, from compostable alternatives to engaging children's programs.
about.value4Desc: Every initiative we undertake considers long-term environmental impact and community benefit.
about.value5Desc: We believe in empowering individuals and communities with the knowledge and tools to create positive change.
about.value6Desc: Our work is driven by genuine care for our planet, our communities, and future generations.

whatWeDo.subtitle: Our comprehensive approach to environmental protection and community empowerment
whatWeDo.program1Desc: Educational campaigns and workshops to raise awareness about plastic's environmental impact while promoting compostable alternatives.
whatWeDo.program2Desc: Comprehensive health and fitness initiatives designed to promote physical activity and wellness among children.
whatWeDo.program3Desc: Large-scale tree plantation drives and forest conservation efforts to combat climate change and restore natural habitats.
whatWeDo.partnershipsDesc: We believe that lasting change happens through collaboration. Our partnership approach brings together local communities, educational institutions, government bodies, and environmental organizations to create sustainable solutions.
whatWeDo.partnership1Desc: Working with schools and universities to integrate environmental education and health awareness into curricula.
whatWeDo.partnership2Desc: Partnering with local authorities to implement large-scale environmental protection and public health initiatives.
whatWeDo.partnership3Desc: Engaging businesses in sustainable practices and corporate social responsibility programs.
whatWeDo.partnership4Desc: Building grassroots networks that empower local communities to lead environmental and health initiatives.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.infoContent: SatyaKarma Welfare Foundation Society collects personal information only when voluntarily provided by individuals who wish to support our mission. This may include contact information for volunteers, donors, and partners.
privacyPolicy.useContent: We use collected information solely for the purpose of advancing our environmental and community initiatives. This includes communication about programs, events, and opportunities to get involved.
privacyPolicy.protectionContent: We implement appropriate security measures to protect personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer personal information to outside parties.
privacyPolicy.contactContent: For questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@satyakarma.org or through our contact form.
